alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Gadsden; Gulf; Leon; Liberty; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 30 at 10:27AM EST until November 30 at 10:45AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 AM EST/945 AM CST/ FOR GULF...WAKULLA...SOUTHEASTERN GADSDEN...SOUTHERN LIBERTY...LEON AND NORTHWESTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES... At 1026 AM EST/926 AM CST/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Tallahassee to near Tallahassee Comm College to 17 miles south of Greensboro to 11 miles south of Blountstown to near Mexico Beach, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, St. Marks, Woodville, Crawfordville, Port St. Joe, Midway, Mexico Beach, Florida State University, Tallahassee Comm College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Florida A And M, Wakulla, Sopchoppy, Lake Bradford, Honeyville, Jewel Fire Tower, Wakulla Springs, Vilas, Cape San Blas and Medart. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon EST/1100 AM CST/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Franklin; Gadsden; Gulf; Leon; Liberty; Wakulla
